paragraph.heading: 1Comment and uncomment lines
paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio editor offers the possibility to comment oruncomment several lines at a time.

item.paragraph:
The "Comment" command corresponds to the Comment entry inthe Advanced submenu of the
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml
Edit
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml Menu . It may be called byusing the keyboard shortcut "Ctrl+K" too. Its action is to inserttwo dashes in front of each
../20_selection.xml selected line.

The "Uncomment" command corresponds to the Uncommententry in the Advanced submenu of the
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml
Edit
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml Menu . It may be called byusing the keyboard shortcut "Ctrl+Shift+K" too. Its action is toremove the two dashes in front of each
../20_selection.xml selected line if there are suchcharacters.

paragraph.note: Note: If there is no selection, thesecommands will be applied to the current line.
